name: Take Notice
tagline: Display special notices anywhere on your WordPress site.
body:
[Take Notice](http://wordpress.org/plugins/take-notice/) lets you add notices to any post or page on your WordPress site.

![An example notice in a WordPress post](http://alisothegeek.com/screenshots/take-notice-1.png)

It even supports custom post types and taxonomies.

![The notice options panels](http://alisothegeek.com/screenshots/take-notice-2.png)

Each notice is managed seperately and can be customized to your heart's content.

![Uses native WordPress colorpickers for customizing notices](http://alisothegeek.com/screenshots/take-notice-3.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
